english.segment1: Quiet your heart. Its just a dream. Go back to sleep
english.segment2: Ill be right here. Ill stay awake as long as you need me. To slay all the dragons. And keep out the monsters. Im watching over you
english.segment3: My love is a light. Driving away all of your fear. So dont be afraid. Remember I made a promise to keep you safe
english.segment4: Youll have your own battles to fight. When you are older. Youll find yourself frozen inside. But always remember
english.segment5: If you feel alone. Facing the giants. And you dont know. What to do
english.segment6: My love is a light. Driving away all of your fear. So dont be afraid. Remember I made a promise to keep you safe.
